A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars episode VIII The Last Jedi  is an exciting addition to the franchise that succeeds in answering many of the questions brought up in 'The Force Awakens' whilst leaving some for the final instalment of the trilogy. 

Whereas the preceding movie played it safe in the way it closely paralleled the plot of A new hope- the equivalent instalment of the preceding trilogy\, this movie diverges from the plot of any previous movies. 

The Last Jedi contains strong character development exceeding that of any of the previous movies\, bringing depth\, heart and humour to the story. Some of the plot points\, respectfully those dealing with the antagonists\, as well as certain developments regarding Luke Skywalker and the Jedi Order\, are daring and serve to connect The Last Jedi to themes explored in some of the non-canon 'Old Republic' error stories.

All in all Star wars The Last Jedi is an impressive and entertaining movie that true Star Wars fans will appreciate.
